Friday, March 3, 2006

Audio from Future of Web Apps summit

Posted by marcel

The Future of Web Apps summit put on by Carson Workshops was a veritable who’s who with representatives from Delicious, Flickr, Yahoo, Google and others. David Heinemeier Hansson was there speaking on behalf 37signals. The audio for each talk is now online, including the panel discussion which includes all the speakers. Find all the talks here.
